metadata.title: JH DESIGN GROUP Men's Chevy Corvette Hoodie C8 Logo Next Generation Pullover Sweatshirt
features: Made in the USA and Imported

Men's Graphic Hoodie: This Chevy Corvette C8 The Next Generation pullover hoodie is formed with a combination of modern fashion and traditional style. Chevy Corvette hoodie features an attached draw string hood and a pullover design. Also check out our other Corvette hoodies, men's Corvette T shirts, and men's Corvette jackets!

Material Used: Designer hoodie is manufactured from a unique blend of cotton and polyester fabric that gives you extra comfort and warmth in chilly winters. For giving a sporty look, this classic pullover hoodie is designed with Chevy Corvette graphics on the front and sleeves.
Versatile Men’s Hoodie: Chevy Corvette hoodie comes with 2 front hand warmer pockets and is a prior choice of sports enthusiasts.

Performance Corvette Men's Hoodie: Comfortable fit of men’s pullover hoodie encourages for a free-spirited look and passion for cars and racing. Hoodie is provided with 2 in. stretch knit cuffs and waistband.

Style and Care: Trendy hoodie is designed in dynamic black color with highly visible Chevy Corvette C8 The Next Generation graphics. Wash the Chevy Corvette hoodie inside-out in machine and tumble dry low or hang dry.
description: JH DESIGN GROUP Men's Chevy Corvette C8 The Next Generation pullover hoodie is suitable for those who are looking to combine traditional style with rugged fashion. Designer hoodie is made with an exclusive blend of cotton and polyester fabric to give extra coziness and warmth in chilly winter season. Chevy Corvette graphics complete the perfect look of classic hoodie. Corvette hoodie comes with an attached draw string hood and a pullover design for a throw-up-and-go appearance. Corvette hoodie is a top choice of sports enthusiasts and is a perfect fit to your winter wardrobe. Also check out our other Corvette hoodies, men's Corvette T shirts, and men's Corvette jackets!
